tool_description: Returns average income level of surrounding areas of an ip address. The income data is based upon a 2014 census from the U.S. Census Bureau.
name: Income by Location
title: Income by Location

api_list.name: /api/income/{ip_address}

required_parameters.name: ip_address
required_parameters.description: The ip address you want to find the average income for the latest US Census data.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://income.p.rapidapi.com/api/income/174.20.20.55"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "income.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://income.p.rapidapi.com/api/income/{ip_address}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "income.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
